block.p: Lisa Kate Margolin, the daughter of Carole and Seymour Margolin of Manhattan, was married on Tuesday at the River Cafe in Brooklyn to John Dellaportas, the son of Teresa Dellaportas and Dr. George Dellaportas of Clinton, S.C. Justice Richard Lee Price of State Supreme Court in the Bronx officiated.

Ms. Margolin, 31, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a partner with her father in Margolin & Margolin, a Manhattan law firm. The bride graduated from McGill University and received a law degree from Georgetown. Her mother is the director of the early childhood program at the Sol Goldman Y of the Educational Alliance in Manhattan.

Ms. Margolin, 31, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a partner with her father in Margolin & Margolin, a Manhattan law firm. The bride graduated from McGill University and received a law degree from Georgetown. Her mother is the director of the early childhood program at the Sol Goldman Y of the Educational Alliance in Manhattan.

Mr. Dellaportas, 30, is a litigation associate at Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver & Jacobson, a law firm in Manhattan. He graduated cum laude from Yale and received a law degree from Columbia. His father is the director of professional services at the Whitten Center, a state hospital for the disabled in Clinton.
The couple chose June 6 as their wedding date to commemorate the day they met in 1994 at a bar exam review in Manhattan.
